Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a solo home run in the 2nd inning
Jesse Winker hit a solo home run in the 4th inning
Starling Marte delivered a two-RBI single in the 6th inning
Brandon Nimmo, Pete Alonso, and Mark Vientos each walked in succession to load the bases in the 6th inning
Jose Iglesias hit a two-run single in the 7th inning
Post-Match Reflections: Sean Manaea acknowledged his Aunt Mabel's passing before the game
Starling Marte expressed the team's desire to celebrate and win at home
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets are one win away from the NLCS
The Mets have never clinched a postseason berth or series at home in the 16 seasons of Citi Fieldâ€™s existence
Others: Philadelphia Phillies scored two runs in the 8th inning
Orion Kerkering entered the game in the 4th inning
Tyrone Taylor threw out Alec Bohm attempting to stretch a single into a double in the 4th inning
Edmundo Sosa reached on an infield single leading off the 8th inning
Phil Maton and Ryne Stanek combined to get three outs in the 8th inning
Iglesias gave the Mets a cushion by swatting a two-run single in the 8th inning
Sean Manaea allowed only three hits and struck out six with two walks and two hit batters over seven-plus innings and 91 pitches
